survey_brief: This survey assesses employee readiness and perceptions regarding the integration of AI tools in the workplace.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with AI tools that could be used in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for familiarity assessment. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with AI tools that could be used in your workplace?

questions.question_text: Which of the following AI tools have you used in your professional work? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. List should be comprehensive but not overwhelming.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkbox question with 'None of the above' as an option.

script.question_text: Which of the following AI tools have you used in your professional work? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How comfortable are you with the idea of AI tools assisting in your daily tasks?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for comfort assessment.

script.question_text: How comfortable are you with the idea of AI tools assisting in your daily tasks?

questions.question_text: What concerns, if any, do you have about the integration of AI tools in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What concerns, if any, do you have about the integration of AI tools in your workplace?

questions.question_text: Which departments do you think would benefit the most from AI integration? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-select but limit to 3 choices. Include 'Other' with open text for specifics.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkbox question with max selection limit and open-text option.

script.question_text: Which departments do you think would benefit the most from AI integration? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to participate in training sessions for new AI tools?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for likelihood assessment.

script.question_text: How likely are you to participate in training sessions for new AI tools?

questions.question_text: What types of AI tools would you find most useful for your role?
questions.routing_logic: Show if Q1 answer is 'Very familiar' or 'Somewhat familiar'
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to tailor AI tool suggestions to specific roles.
questions.scripter_notes: Open-text field with conditional routing based on Q1.

script.question_text: What types of AI tools would you find most useful for your role?
script.routing_logic: Show if Q1 answer is 'Very familiar' or 'Somewhat familiar'

questions.question_text: Do you believe AI tools will improve your overall productivity?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for agreement assessment.

script.question_text: Do you believe AI tools will improve your overall productivity?

questions.question_text: Which of the following barriers do you foresee in adopting AI tools? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-select. Include 'Other' with open text for specifics.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkbox question with open-text option.

script.question_text: Which of the following barriers do you foresee in adopting AI tools? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you prefer to receive training on new AI tools?
questions.client_notes: Allow single or multi-select based on client preference.

script.question_text: How would you prefer to receive training on new AI tools?
